name: Dark Minimal WhatsApp Web
description: Sick of light? Join the darkness! You can easily change the accent/theme color according to your preference by clicking the button CUSTOMIZE SETTINGS right below the preview picture. Constantly updating as the newest WhatsApp web update release comes online (last update: November 20th 2020). It may take a couple of days to fix the skin after a new release comes out, but don't worry... I will be on the case ;) Consider supporting me by donating on Paypal Stay safe and have a productive day! UPDATED FEB 2021
additional_info:
v. 5.1.1 - 05/03/2021
- enhanced contrast on selected and hovered chats (chat list on the left side pane) for a more immediate identification of the selected / highlighted chat.
- minor improvements

v. 5.1.0 - 05/03/2021
- fixed issue about colour customisation. My bad! It's now working again.
Thanks Samarth for the heads up!

v. 5.0.2 - 03/03/2021
- minor updates

v. 5.0.1 - 25/02/2021
- send files modal style updated

v. 5.0.0 - 25/02/2021
- new whatsapp update: skin major update

v. 4.0.7 - 29/11/2020
- group chat member names are styled in a better way. Colors match the left side background bar

v. 4.0.6 - 26/11/2020
- theme color now customisable again

v. 4.0.5 - 24/11/2020
- removed communication message and fixed read/unread opacity on icons accordingly

v. 4.0.4 - 24/11/2020
- minor touches

v. 4.0.3 - 21/11/2020
- new WhatsApp web patch - minor touches

v. 4.0.2 - 21/11/2020
- new WhatsApp web patch - most of the skin is now fixed

v. 4.0.1 - 20/11/2020
- new WhatsApp web patch - first critical fix

v. 3.47 - 25/09/2020
- groups titles color is again the accent color (whatsapp patch broke it)

v. 3.46 - 23/09/2020
- styled a few secondary icons

v. 3.45 - 27/07/2020
- fixed chats messages background glitch when quoting messages and group quoted usernames background

v. 3.44 - 10/07/2020
- links sent by your contact are displayed with a dark background (previously whitish)

v. 3.43 - 04/07/2020
- sharing contact icon status and card are now styled

v. 3.42 - 20/06/2020
- "can't reach phone" popup message is now styled

v. 3.41 - 20/06/2020
- minor adjustments
- location icon styled correctly


v. 3.4 - 10/06/2020
- sent unread messages opacity reduced
- light backgrounds from parent elements causing flashy transitions and glitched border effects are now dark
- group chats member names have their specific color (previously grey)

v. 3.3 - 06/06/2020
- better look and feel of quoted messages and links previews
- chat tabs background container is now gray. No more white flashy effect when the chat tabs change order
- unsent messages icon has also a faded color now

v 3.2 - 05/06/2020
- icons colors for read / unread messages are displayed accordingly
- icons colors for listened / not listened voice messages are displayed accordingly

v. 3.1 - 05/06/2020
- quoted message, links, several icons are now styled
- warning messages in the home screen added
- minor elements fixed

v. 3.0 - 05/06/2020
- fixed issues after web application update
- links and quoted messages remain to be fixed


v. 2.1 - 01/06/2020
- voice messages' runnable track is now white instead of greenish

v. 2.0 - 30/05/2020
- new color scheme & some minor elements adjustments

N.B. If you liked the previous style better you can download the .css file here:
https://www.ithinkitsfun.it/whatsapp-web-skins/whatsapp-stilish-older.css
or PM me for assistance, altough I don't recommend it as I'll stop updating it. 

v. 1.31 - 25/05/2020
- styled several unstyled icons

v. 1.3 - 12/05/2020
- styled playing video UI icons

v. 1.2 - 09/05/2020
- the accent color is now customisable. I'd personally recommend

#ffbb86 - lighter orange
#ff0057 - flashy pink
#f95e7e - lighter pink
#00e2ff - teal
#009688 - musky green

v. 1.1 - 30/04/2020
- multiple message selection is now styled
- actions bar for the multiple message selection is now styled

v. 1.0 - 05/04/2020

Send me an email at rwndeloused@gmail.com to notify bugs or if you have any suggestions. I look forward to your help to improve our skin :)
css:
@-moz-document domain("web.whatsapp.com") {

/* @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway"); */

/* ignore the error icon below if using the Stylish code editor*/
:root .dark, :root {
  --mainColor: /*[[mainColor]]*/;
  
  /* color-scheme */
  --superLightGray: #9e9e9e;
  --lightGray: rgb(85, 85, 85);
  --darkerGray: #1c1c1c;
  --darkGray: #222222;
  --blackRgb: 0,0,0;
  --mainColor: #fd5154;
  --mainColor: /*[[mainColor]]*/;
  --whitish: #d5d5d5;
  /* --alertMessage: "IMPORTANT: whatsapp released a new version of whatsapp web on 19.11.2020 breaking all the custom skins out there. I will release fixes in the next days to make it work again. Keep manually updating!!!"; */
  --alertMessage: "IMPORTANT: I fixed an important issue where the color customisation wouldn't work. Please UNISTALL the skin, then go to the skin URL, select a color of your choice and REINSTALL the skin! ";
  --alertMessageSize: 17x;
  --audio-progress-played-incoming: var(--mainColor) !important;
  --audio-progress-played-outgoing: var(--mainColor) !important;
  --audio-progress-incoming: var(--mainColor) !important;
  --audio-progress-outgoing: var(--mainColor) !important;
  --video-primary: var(--mainColor) !important;
  --cl-1: var(--mainColor) !important;
  --cl-2: var(--mainColor) !important;
  --cl-3: #B14AED;
  --cl-4: #4474e4;
  --cl-5: #34d3b3;
  --cl-6: #2add7e;
  --cl-7: #f5f12f;
  --cl-8: #f69d37;
  --cl-9: #f32d4b;
  --cl-10: #e73287;
}

/*========= mentioned name =========*/
/*========= mentioned name =========*/

._1VzZY .matched-mention {
  cursor: pointer;
  color: var(--mainColor) !important;
}

/*========= video player bar + thumb fix =========*/
/*========= video player bar + thumb fix =========*/

.piNo6, ._2KNOi, ._3DHGF {
  z-index: 99999
}
._2KNOi {
  left: -5px !important;
}


*::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: var(--lightGray) !important;
}

body,
span,
header,
div {
  font-family: "Raleway", sans-serif !important;
}
body {
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, black, black) !important;
}
/*======== overlay messages ======== */
/*======== overlay messages ======== */

._NAbm.N7Dyd,
.kA6WR.N7Dyd,
._1lcup,
._39Lm1 {
  background: linear-gradient(15deg,rgba(var(--lightGray),0),rgba(var(--lightGray),0) 45%,rgba(var(--lightGray),.12) 70%,rgba(var(--lightGray),.33)) !important;
}
[data-asset-intro-image-light],
[data-asset-intro-image-dark] {
  position: relative;
  top: 100px;
  background-image: url(http://i.imgur.com/Nzo0SUV.png);
  border-radius: 0px !important;
  filter: hue-rotate(-167deg);
  transform: scale(0.5) !important;
}
progress,
a._3FXB1 {
  color: var(--mainColor) !important;
}

input#input-chatlist-search {
  background-color: var(--whitish) !important;
  border-radius: 5px;
  color: black;
}
progress[value]::-webkit-progress-value {
  background-color: var(--mainColor) !important;
}


/*========= alert message - maintenance =========*/
/*========= alert message - maintenance =========*/

#app:after {
  display: flex;
  display: none;
  color: var(--mainColor);
  content: var(--alertMessage);
  animation: alert 50s infinite linear;
  top: 0;
  white-space: nowrap;
  font-size: var(--alertMessageSize);
  padding: 2px 50px;
  height: 55px;
  left: -210vw;
  position: fixed;
  animation-iteration-count: 2;
  z-index: 99999999999999999999999999;
  background: var(--darkGray);
  text-align: center;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
}

/*======== icons svg fill ========*/
/*======== icons svg fill ========*/

div[role="button"] svg path,
span[data-icon="status-dblcheck"] svg path,
span[data-icon="chevron-right-alt"] svg path,
span[data-icon="checkbox-round-unchecked"] svg path,
span[data-icon="checkbox-round-checked"] svg path:nth-child(1),
span[data-icon="round-x-inv"] svg path,
span[data-icon="round-send-inv"] svg path,

span[data-icon="msg-video-light"] svg path,
span[data-icon="msg-video"] svg path,
span[data-icon="recalled-out"] svg path,
span[data-icon="ptt-status"] svg path,
span[data-icon="ptt-out-blue"] svg path,

span[data-icon="ptt"] svg path,
span[data-icon="forwarded"] svg path,
span[data-icon="recalled-in"] svg path,
span[data-icon="back-light"] svg path,
span[data-icon="audio-play"] svg path,
span[data-icon="audio-pause"] svg path,
span[data-icon="audio-download"] svg path,
span[data-icon="media-play"] svg path,
span[data-icon="back-blue"] svg path,
span[data-icon="muted"] svg path,
span[data-icon="search"] svg path,
span[data-icon="default-group"] svg path:first-child,
span[data-icon="default-user"] svg path:first-child,
span[data-icon="x"] svg path,
span[data-icon="x-alt"] svg path,
span[data-icon="down"] svg path,
span[data-icon="down-context"] svg path,
span[data-icon="status-image"] svg path,
span[data-icon="status-video"] svg path,
span[data-icon="laptop"] svg path,
g[clip-path="url(#image-SVGID_2_)"] path,
g[clip-path="url(#camera-SVGID_2_)"] path,
g[clip-path="url(#document-SVGID_2_)"] path,
g[clip-path="url(#contact-SVGID_2_)"] path,
g[clip-path="url(#rooms-SVGID_2_)"] path,
._3xkAl svg path {
  fill: var(--mainColor) !important;
}

._6vYCc,
._37Tzw,
._1b8eK,
._34Zo9,
.RXmfT svg path,
._3fnYk {
  stroke: var(--mainColor) !important;
}

._1jJLh span svg path,
.yavlE span svg path,
span[data-icon="ptt-status"] svg path:first-child,
span[data-icon="ptt-out-blue"] svg path:first-child,
span[data-icon="ptt-in-blue"] svg path:first-child,
span[data-icon="ptt-out-gray"] svg path:first-child,
span[data-icon="ptt-in-gray"] svg path:first-child {
  fill: var(--darkGray) !important;
}
._3hV1n span svg path,
._2m8GO span svg path:nth-child(2) {
  fill: var(--whitish) !important;
}
.tail-container {
  display: none;
}
.app {
  box-shadow: 0px 0px 2px 0px black !important;
}
._2EXPL:hover:after,
._2EXPL._3df_h:after,
._2EXPL._1f1zm:after {
  border-top: 0px !important;
}
._1fkhx,
._3AwwN,
._2WP9Q,
._2UaNq._3mMX1:after,
._2UaNq._16_lP:after,
._2UaNq:hover:after,
._1WWP0,
._3Pwfx:hover:after,
._3Pwfx._1GGbM:after,
._2Z4DV:hover:after {
  border: none !important;
}
._1wSzK {
  display: none;
}
._3NteO {
  cursor: zoom-in;
}
div[aria-selected]:hover, div[aria-selected="true"] {
  filter: contrast(1.1)
}

._20WGU,
._15CAo._3EQsG {
  background: linear-gradient(
    15deg,
    transparent,
    transparent 45%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 70%,
    rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.33)
  ) !important;
}

._1kdBg:after {
  content: "Enjoy the darkness";
  color: var(--mainColor) !important;
  background-color: transparent !important;
  left: 50% !important;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  width: 50%;
  text-align: center;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  position: absolute;
  font-size: 35px;
  height: 35px;
  font-weight: 800;
  padding: 50px !important;
  top: 20%;
  border-top: none !important;
  animation: 5.5s pulse infinite;
}

.piNo6, ._2KNOi, input[type="range"] {
  cursor: pointer;
}

@keyframes pulse {
  0% {
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 0px var(--mainColor);
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 0px var(--mainColor);
  }
  45% {
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 15px #ff613800;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 15px #ff613800;
  }
}

@keyframes alert {
  from {
    left: 110%;
  }
  to {
    left: -200%;
  }
}
}
